thread.title: Madoff trustee seeks release of $1.5 billion for fraud victims
thread.title_full: Madoff trustee seeks release of $1.5 billion for fraud victims

title: Madoff trustee seeks release of $1.5 billion for fraud victims
text:
Published By: Reuters - Money - Today 
NEW YORK (Reuters) - The trustee recouping money for victims of Bernard Madoff's multibillion-dollar Ponzi scheme sought approval on Tuesday...
